meaningMnemonic: The amount of people with mouths (that you have to feed) is the <vocabulary>population</vocabulary> that you have to feed.
readingMnemonic:
This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. Since 人 has two on'yomi readings, here's a mnemonic to help you remember which one to use:

Here at Tofugu, we measure <vocabulary>population</vocabulary> in <reading>jean</reading>s (じん). Each of us has just one pair of jeans, so if you know the jean count you know the population.
